mapper.sql: MEDICALORDER_ID, MEDICALORDERNO, MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME, MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME, MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME, MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT, STATUS, CREATEBY, CREATEON
mapper.select: select MEDICALORDER_ID,MEDICALORDERNO,MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME,MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME, MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME,MEDICALCENTER_ID,STATUS from tb_medicalorder where MEDICALORDERNO = #{ORDERNO} and STATUS != '已确认'
mapper.update:
update
set MEDICALORDER_ID = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}, MEDICALORDERNO = #{MEDICALORDERNO}, MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME = #{MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME},
MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME = #{MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME},
MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME = #{MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME},
MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT = #{MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT}, STATUS = #{STATUS}, MEDICALORDER_ID = MEDICALORDER_ID where MEDICALORDER_ID = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}
mapper.select: select m.MEDICALORDER_ID as MEDICALORDER_ID, m.MEDICALORDERNO as MEDICALORDERNO, m.MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME as MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME, m.MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME as MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME, m.MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME as MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME, m.MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT as MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT, m.STATUS as STATUS, m.CREATEBY as CREATEBY, m.CREATEON as CREATEON, m.ORDER_ID as ORDER_ID, sau.`NAME` as `NAME`, sau.PHONE as PHONE from tb_medicalorder m LEFT JOIN tb_order o ON m.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau ON o.APP_USERID = sau.USER_ID where MEDICALORDER_ID = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}
SELECT mei.* FROM TB_MEDICALORDERITEM moi LEFT JOIN TB_MEDICALEXAMITEM mei ON moi.`MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID` = mei.`MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID` WHERE moi.`MEDICALORDER_ID` = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}

select sau.`NAME` as UNAME,mc.`NAME` as CNAME,o.ORDER_ID as ORDER_ID,mei.`NAME` as MNAME, mo.MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME as MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME,mo.MEDICALORDER_ID as MEDICALORDER_ID,o.ORDERNO as ORDERNO, mo.MEDICALORDERNO as MEDICALORDERNO,mo.`STATUS` as MSTATUS from tb_medicalexamitem mei LEFT JOIN tb_medicalorderitem moi on mei.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID=moi.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID left join tb_medicalorder mo on moi.MEDICALORDER_ID=mo.MEDICALORDER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_medicalcenter mc on mc.MEDICALCENTER_ID = mei.MEDICALCENTER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_order o on o.ORDER_ID=mo.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau on sau.USER_ID = o.APP_USERID where o.ORDER_ID = #{ORDER_ID} GROUP BY mei.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID

select sau.`NAME` as UNAME,mc.`NAME` as CNAME,o.ORDER_ID as ORDER_ID,mei.`NAME` as MNAME, mo.MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME as MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME,mo.MEDICALORDER_ID as MEDICALORDER_ID,o.ORDERNO as ORDERNO, mo.MEDICALORDERNO as MEDICALORDERNO,mo.`STATUS` as MSTATUS from tb_medicalexamitem mei LEFT JOIN tb_medicalorderitem moi on mei.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID=moi.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID left join tb_medicalorder mo on moi.MEDICALORDER_ID=mo.MEDICALORDER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_medicalcenter mc on mc.MEDICALCENTER_ID = mei.MEDICALCENTER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_order o on o.ORDER_ID=mo.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau on sau.USER_ID = o.APP_USERID where o.APP_USERID = #{APP_USERID}

select sau.`NAME` as UNAME,mc.`NAME` as CNAME,o.ORDER_ID as ORDER_ID,o.ORDERTOTALAMOUNT as ORDERTOTALAMOUNT,mei.`NAME` as MNAME, mo.MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME as MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME,mo.MEDICALORDER_ID as MEDICALORDER_ID,o.ORDERNO as ORDERNO, mo.MEDICALORDERNO as MEDICALORDERNO,mo.`STATUS` as MSTATUS,mc.LOCATION as LOCATION from tb_medicalexamitem mei LEFT JOIN tb_medicalorderitem moi on mei.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID=moi.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID left join tb_medicalorder mo on moi.MEDICALORDER_ID=mo.MEDICALORDER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_medicalcenter mc on mc.MEDICALCENTER_ID = mei.MEDICALCENTER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_order o on o.ORDER_ID=mo.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau on sau.USER_ID = o.APP_USERID where o.APP_USERID = #{USER_ID} and mo.STATUS = "已预约"

select sau.`NAME` as UNAME,mc.`NAME` as CNAME,o.ORDER_ID as ORDER_ID,o.ORDERTOTALAMOUNT as ORDERTOTALAMOUNT,mei.`NAME` as MNAME, mo.MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME as MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME,mo.MEDICALORDER_ID as MEDICALORDER_ID,o.ORDERNO as ORDERNO, mo.MEDICALORDERNO as MEDICALORDERNO,mo.`STATUS` as MSTATUS,mc.LOCATION as LOCATION from tb_medicalexamitem mei LEFT JOIN tb_medicalorderitem moi on mei.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID=moi.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID left join tb_medicalorder mo on moi.MEDICALORDER_ID=mo.MEDICALORDER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_medicalcenter mc on mc.MEDICALCENTER_ID = mei.MEDICALCENTER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_order o on o.ORDER_ID=mo.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_app_user sau on sau.USER_ID = o.APP_USERID where (o.APP_USERID = #{USER_ID} or o.APP_USERID in ( select sauau.user_id_two from sys_app_user_and_user sauau where sauau.user_id_one = #{USER_ID})) and mo.STATUS = "已预约"

select mo.ORDERNO as ORDERNO, mo.ORDERGENERATIONTIME as ORDERGENERATIONTIME, mo.ORDERBOOKINGTIME as ORDERBOOKINGTIME, mo.ORDEREXECUTIONTIME as ORDEREXECUTIONTIME, mo.ORDERTOTALAMOUNT as ORDERTOTALAMOUNT, mo.STATUS as STATUS, mo.ORDER_ID as ORDER_ID, sau.NAME AS NAME, sau.USER_ID as USER_ID, sau.AVATAR as AVATAR from tb_medicalorder mo left join tb_order o on mo.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID left join sys_app_user sau on o.APP_USERID = sau.USER_ID where mo.MEDICALORDER_ID = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}

select mei.`NAME` as `MNAME`,mei.SELLINGPRICE as SELLINGPRICE ,mc.`NAME` as CNAME from tb_medicalexamitem mei LEFT JOIN tb_medicalorderitem moi on mei.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID = moi.MEDICALEXAMITEM_ID LEFT JOIN tb_medicalorder mo on mo.MEDICALORDER_ID = moi.MEDICALORDER_ID LEFT JOIN tb_medicalcenter mc on mo.MEDICALCENTER_ID = mc.MEDICALCENTER_ID where mo.MEDICALORDER_ID = #{MEDICALORDER_ID}

select m.MEDICALORDER_ID as MEDICALORDER_ID, m.MEDICALORDERNO as MEDICALORDERNO, m.MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME as MEDICALORDERGENERATIONTIME, m.MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME as MEDICALORDERBOOKINGTIME, m.MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME as MEDICALORDEREXECUTIONTIME, m.MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT as MEDICALTOTALAMOUNT, m.STATUS as STATUS from tb_medicalorder m where m.ORDER_ID = #{ORDER_ID}
